EmailTemplate.subject: SOA No - Case No - UL Standard - Delivery Date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
Thank you for choosing SunPower! Attached to this email is a copy of your Sales Order Acknolwedgement No. ________________ in relation with PO no. _________________.
We would like to inform you: payment is required in order for our team to ship the materials.
Payment due date: _______________
Should we not receive any payment on the noted due date above, please note this order will be re-scheduled for delivery until amount has been settled.
Order is scheduled for delivery on: ________________
May we kindly request an email confirmation upon receipt of materials on the date stated above.
Should you need further assistance for any issues or concern please feel free to send us an email at : SPWR_ULSUPPORT@sunpowercorp.com
Sincerely,
SunPower UL Support Team
Global Business and Finance Services | office +00.800.786.76937
